Name: Gotcha
About the game: Gotcha is a chaotic couch co-op game for 1 - 4 players. You and your friends must escape from chasing adults. Make the trap to block adults or trap them down. The adults in Queenstown went crazy after eating Queen's processed food. It seems that chemical food are bad for people's healthy. Only the most naughty children can save this town. Players must journey through the a variety of scenes that within full of various crazy adults, and finally destroy the Queen's Food Factory. Seek kids who can conquer any adult! Each level in Queenstown brings a new challenge for your team to overcome. Whether escaping from chasing dog, avoiding the teacher in the school, runing through the glacier, moving between hunter's traps, each level will test the co-op skills of your team. SIMPLE CONTROLS There are three elements in the game: escape, trap, and rescue. There are different ways to co-op in each scenes. Only the best team can make the miracle happen. ESCAPE TRAP SAVE KID A VARIETY OF TRAPS More than 10 kinds of traps allow you to mix and match freely. You can choose offensive, functionary, or mashup traps, and cooperate with other players to achieve the best performance. DIFFICULTY SELECTION Three levels of difficulties, Gotcha is suitable for family fun, but also for players who like to challenge themselves.
